summary: Are you low on IMMERSION? Boost your self-worth by keeping an IMMERSIVE, homicidal deviant as your companion!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]IMMERSIVE IDIOTS: RODERICK REDBEARD [/b][size=3]by Someguy[/size][b]

DESCRIPTION[/b]:[/size]

Some mods fit neatly into predesignated categories, while others shatter the fetters of convention and taste through the sheer might of IMMERSION. [i]Roderick Redbeard[/i] is such a mod. In the course of this plugin, you'll undertake a collection of pointless and unconnected quests that set you down the righteous path of IMMERSION. Additionally, you'll gain an IMMERSIVE companion who muses endlessly on the finer points of procreation, infanticide, and alcoholism.

[i]Roderick Redbeard[/i] represents the initial installment in what will hopefully become a series of IMMERSIVE companions. What type of companions? The sort that reinforce base urges, complement your vices, and imbue a false sense of moral and intellectual superiority by way of their own depravity and ignorance.

[size=4][b]OBLIGATORY VISUAL ASSURANCE[/b]:[/size]
Shortly after the mod's release, some players expressed concern about the dearth of visual evidence for the mod's quality. After due consideration, I will now release a private design document which should stifle any doubts.

Here is the plot diagram:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IFcjf4a.jpg[/img]

I rest my case.

[size=4][b]INSTALLATION[/b]:[/size]

Install the mod with NMM or place the contents of archived 'data' folder in the corresponding folder in your [i]Skyrim[/i] directory.

[size=4][b]GETTING STARTED[/b]:[/size]

Once you've completed the riveting and unforgettable questline for the Companions, seek out a red-haired drunk stumbling about in Jorrvaskr. Rapidly click through his bumbling bombast and you'll soon be tasked with killing various entities throughout Skyrim.

[size=4][b]FEEDBACK[/b]:[/size]

I heartily welcome cogent, constructive criticism, but be warned - the polite, tolerant modder of c. 2010 has given way to the jaded, snark-spewing drunk of the present. I now follow the "Ass" rule - if you show your ass in the comments, I block and ban your ass. I'm a petty tyrant, and the comments are my banana republic, so act accordingly.

[size=4][b]A WARNING:[/b][/size]

I won't be so bold as to call this mod "Lore-Friendly", but I will deem it "Lore-Plausible". Through Herculean willpower, I managed to write and voice the 400+ lines of dialogue without a single utterance of the word "Fuck". It is possible that other, potentially anachronistic terms slipped in, as I was not as scrupulous in reviewing the content this time.

I produced this plugin over a few weekends as a means to refresh my long-atrophied grasp of Papyrus in anticipation of [i]Fallout 4[/i], which I expect sometime after the Rapture, Ragnarok, and Cthulhu's glorious return. If casual quips about infanticide and erotic asphyxiation (NOT AT THE SAME TIME!) are offensive, you should probably avoid this mod.
[size=4]
[b]DIFFICULTY[/b]:[/size]

Almost all my plugins are oriented towards high-level characters, and [i]Roderick Redbeard[/i] is no exception. You will square off against a number of powerful, perk-ridden personalities designed to pummel you into paste. I recommend that you wait until level thirty before initiating the first questline.

[size=4][b]STATISTICS:[/b][/size]

Two Quests: "Unnatural Selection" and "Jorund's Prize"
450+ lines of fully-voiced, lip-synced dialogue
One fully-functional companion
Two new dungeons (both radiant-compatible)
Offers roughly one hour of new content
[size=4]
[b]OTHER, LESS IMMERSIVE MODS:[/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22722/?][i]Sword of Sigdan[/i][/url]
[size=4]
[b]CREDITS[/b]:[/size]

The word IMMERSIVE, for inspiring me
Bethesda, for releasing [i]Skyrim[/i] and the Creation Kit
The community, for undying support in spite of my changeable, irascible nature
The goddess who poses as my wife, for ceaseless support and the sharing of beer

[size=4][b]Permissions:[/b][/size]
Do not copy or redistribute this mod without my explicit permission. This is a Nexus-exclusive mod.

Commercial use strictly prohibited.
